attributes.action: Post-Brexit, all 53 Commonwealth nations should create a new trading group
attributes.additional_details: The Commonwealth comprises of approximately 2.4 billion people (a third of the world's population), and its size and power would dwarf the EU, thus becoming a global trading force to be reckoned with.
attributes.background:
The Commonwealth Trading Group (CTG) will not include the movement of people or the centralising of laws but instead will be a trading group only. It will trade in two ways:

1. Amongst each of the 53 membering nations and
2. Other groups and countries, such as, the EU, America, China etc.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on all Commonwealth countries, not just the UK Government, to take action.
